North_Las_Vegas.Las Vegas Country Club:
The Las Vegas Country Club is a private membership club located in the Winchester area of metropolitan Las Vegas, Nevada.


== History ==
It was built on the site of a 1950s horse and automobile racetrack named Las Vegas Downs and later the Las Vegas Park Speedway. It was developed by businessmen Moe Dalitz, Allard Roen, Irwin Molasky and Merv Adelson.
